body.p: The primary BIOS configurations for the Dell Red Hat Cloudera solutions are for Infrastructure nodes and data nodes.

ul.li: For more information about Dell PowerEdge R730xd BIOS settings, please see the Dell PowerEdge R730 and R730xd Owner's Manual.

body.note: Dell recommends that you perform BIOS updates on a regular basis. It is particularly important that your operating system firmware be up to date prior to installing Cloudera Manager.
